verses.name: 2 Kings 18:23
verses.text: Now therefore, I pray thee, give pledges to my lord the king of Assyria, and I will deliver thee two thousand horses, if thou be able on thy part to set riders upon them.

verses.name: 2 Kings 18:24
verses.text: How then wilt thou turn away the face of one captain of the least of my master’s servants, and put thy trust on Egypt for chariots and for horsemen?

verses.name: 2 Kings 18:25
verses.text: Am I now come up without the Lord against this place to destroy it? The Lord said to me, Go up against this land, and destroy it.
